commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added test to GeneratorTest.
Added a test to check if rotateImage() throws an IllegalArgumentException when an illegal argument is given.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Tweaked code of testRotateBufferedImage() and corrected a grammar mistake of its description.
Removed result and put the returned value of rotateImage(...) directly as the actual value in assertEqual. Furthermore in the description the word "whether" was replaced with "if".

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added test to GeneratorTest.
Added a test to check if rotateImage will return null when no picture is given.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added test to GeneratorTest.
Added a test where it is checked if rotateImage() returns the same image when a rotation value of 0.0 is given.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added Javadoc comment to setup(), formated GeneratorTest and Added save action.
Added a Javadoc comment to clarify to why it exists, formated the class to get rid of any unwanted code style errors and also changed the setting so an edited class now gets automatically formated. This means that any formating will no longer be documented in any further commits.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Edited setup() for GeneratorTest.
Put some objects outside setup() so tests can interact with them too.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Created Generator test.
Created a generator test, with the before() and after() method implemented. It also requires a resource (picture.jpg), which is located in test/resource/org/jis/generator.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Actually added JUnit dependency to jmjrst.main.
In the last commit, the POM of jmjrst.main was not saved, thus not really adding any dependencies to jmjrst.main. Again, now jmjrst.main has a JUnit dependency for testing.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added JUnit dependency.
Added a JUnit dependency to jmjrst.main for testing.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Packaged project.
Packaged iMage and jmjrst.main for turning the project in.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Edited GroupID and ArtifactID of jmjrst.main.
Edited the groupID and ArtifactID of jmjrst.main to meet requirements.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Updated and packaged project.
Updated and packaged iMage and jmjrst.main for turning it in.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Corrected code style error.
Corrected a code style error in line 53 of Consumer where the if-statement was missing curly brackets.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Fixed code style error.
Fixed a code style error in line 62 ofMain where the Main class wasn't declared as final.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Fixed code style error.
Fixed a code style error in line 194 of GallerieDialog where a curly bracket was misplaced.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added swt1 checkstyle.
Added the swt1 checkstyle from jmjrst.main/src/main/test. The project now gets checked with this checkstyle.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Checked if iMage/.gitignore functions correctly.
Checked if .gitignore in iMage ignores the folder target. For some reason it does not ignore it.
Signed-off-by: Joshua Eilebrecht <joshua_eilebrecht@web.de>

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Edited iMage/.gitignore.
Added target in iMage to .gitignore so git ignores the repackaged projects.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added addClasspath to jmjrst.main manifest.
Set addClasspath to true in the manifest of jmjrst.main. Also repackaged the project again.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Fixed a problem with the folder structure of jmjrst.main.
Fixed a problem where the resulting .jar of jmjrst.main threw a Missing ResourceException. Also packaged iMage and jmjrst.main for testing purposes.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Packaged jmjrst.main.
Packaged the module jmjrst.main for testing purposes.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Updated jmjrst.main.
Updated the module jmjrst.main so it can be packaged correctly.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Corrected main class definition in jmjrst.main.
Corrected a mistake made in the pom of jmjrst.main, where it defined the wrong main class.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Updated project.
Updated the whole Maven project iMage to make the manifest of jmjrst.main include the main class of jmjrst.main.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Defined main class of jmjrst.main and packaged iMage and jmjrst.main.
Edited the pom file of jmjrst.main to define the main class of jmjrst.main so the packaged jmjrst.main become executable. Furthermore tested whether jmjrst.main and iMage is still able to get packaged (it packed both classes successfully).

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Copied files into jmjrst.main.
Copied following files from the last test project over to jmjrst.main:
- src/assembly/src.xml - src/test/resources/checkstyle_swt1.xml - checkstyle.launch - integration-test.launch

commit.msg:
Applied ub1_a1_g_patch to jmjrst.main.
Applied a patch to resolve some issues with ImageFormatException.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Updated project.
Updated the Maven project iMage to see the changes made in eclipse.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Added jmjrst to jmjrst.main.
Copied the files of jmjrst to the module jmjrst.main.

commit.author: Joshua Eilebrecht
commit.msg:
Created jmjrst.main.
Created a new simple Maven module called jmjrst.main, which is part of iMage.

Packaged iMage.
Packaged iMage to see if it works.
